title: 'Foxcatcher' A Standout At Cannes Film Festival
teaser: Directed by Bennet Miller, Foxcatcher, starring Steve Carrell, is getting Oscar buzz. This is a straight dramatic role for Carrell. It tells the story of the murder of Olympic wrestler Dave Schultz.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
